title: SHAREHOLDER ALERT: Levi & Korsinsky, LLP Notifies Shareholders Of Envivio, Inc. Of Commencement Of An Investigation Concerning The Fairness Of The Sale Of The Company To Ericsson
content:
Reddit   Email  Print  Reprint     
The following statement is being issued by Levi & Korsinsky, LLP: 
 To: All Persons or Entities who purchased Envivio, Inc. stock prior to September 10, 2015  . 
    You are hereby notified that Levi & Korsinsky, LLP has commenced an investigation into the fairness of the sale of Envivio, Inc. (NASDAQ:ENVI) to Ericsson for $4.10 in cash per share. Shareholders representing approximately 34% of Envivio's outstanding common stock have already agreed to tender their shares. To learn more about the investigation and your rights, go to : 
 http://zlk.9nl.com/envivioinc  
or contact Joseph E. Levi, Esq. either via email at jlevi@zlk.com or by telephone at (212) 363-7500, toll-free: (877) 363-5972. There is no cost or obligation to you . 
Levi & Korsinsky is a national firm with offices in New York, New Jersey, Connecticut and Washington D.C. The firm's attorneys have extensive expertise in prosecuting securities litigation involving financial fraud, representing investors throughout the nation in securities lawsuits and have recovered hundreds of millions of dollars for aggrieved shareholders . For more information, please feel free to contact any of the attorneys listed below. Attorney advertising. Prior results do not guarantee similar outcomes.
